welcome.title: Welcome to my digital portfolio as a Front‑End Developer
welcome.subtitle: Within these virtual walls, I invite you to explore my creativity, dedication, and technical knowledge in the world of web development.

about.title: Who I Am
about.text:
Hi! My name is Izabelle, and I'm a Mid‑Level Front‑End Developer with over 3 years of experience building responsive, accessible, and scalable interfaces. I always strive to create reusable components and deliver solutions that enhance the user experience.

If you're looking for a dedicated developer who is passionate about technology, I would love to chat about how I can contribute to the success of your project or company. Let’s build something amazing together!

education.title: A little more about my journey so far.

items.title: Professional Qualification in Domain Driven Design (Java), Cloud Computing
Professional Qualification in Responsive Web - Front End and User Experience
Code Versioning with Git and GitHub
Mid-Level Front-End Developer
items.tasks: Development and maintenance of digital projects for major clients such as Lubrax, Vibra, Postos BR, and Pinheiro Neto. Creation of personalized email marketing campaigns for Elo and collaboration in multidisciplinary teams, ensuring agile and high-quality deliveries.
items.skills: AngularJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, REST API, Laravel, MySQL, Drupal, Git, Figma

items.title: Junior Front-End Developer
items.tasks: Development and maintenance of websites and web applications for clients such as LG, Seagate, Lenovo, and Grupo Comolatti. Creation of interactive web games for RedHat event activations and production of responsive email marketing campaigns for clients and internal use.
items.skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, Tailwind, TypeScript, REST API, Git, Figma

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Creating websites and web applications using the latest technologies and best development practices.

items.title: Responsive Web Design
items.description: Ensuring your site or application works on all devices, providing a consistent user experience.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: Improving your website or application’s performance, ensuring fast load times and a smooth experience.

items.title: Maintenance & Support
items.description: Ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure your site or application stays up‑to‑date and working perfectly.

items.title: API Integration
items.description: Connecting your site or application with external services to expand functionality and enhance user experience.

items.title: Web Accessibility
items.description: Ensuring accessibility for all users of your site or application, including those with disabilities, following accessibility guidelines.

items.title: Email Marketing
items.description: Creating personalized and engaging email campaigns focused on engagement and conversions.

items.title: Email Signatures
items.description: Developing personalized, professional signatures compatible with different platforms.

items.title: Games for Activations
items.description: Producing interactive games that convey the theme of the event.

items.title: Dream Agency
items.description: Modern landing page for a fictional digital services agency, showcasing plans and solutions with a responsive design and a focus on conversion.

items.title: Next Journey
items.description: Hotsite for a fictional promotional campaign, where users can register and compete for an all-inclusive trip to a tropical paradise.

items.title: Minefield Game
items.description: Digital version of the classic Minesweeper, developed to challenge logic and strategy, with a clean interface and dynamic gameplay.

items.title: Memory Game
items.description: Pokémon-inspired memory game that stimulates focus and agility, featuring an engaging design and easy-to-play mechanics.
